Text.Text: You must be war party.  At last, Saablic Tan answered Kratuuk's prayers!  You will rid me of that lich, yes?
Saablic Tan did not tell you about Kratuuk's prayer request?  You are war party I pray for, yes?
What you need to know?
Kratuuk barely remember...  But, Kratuuk do remember a great coldness just before opening Kratuuk's dead eyes and gazing upon the god, Saablic Tan.
Of course!  Kratuuk witnessed the miracle of Saablic Tan bringing Kratuuk's warriors back from dead, same way he brought Kratuuk back.  We praise him for making us better than living.
Yes.  We make sacrifices to Saablic Tan whenever we catch living.  It is tribute to show our devotion.
They are to be offered to the great god, Saablic Tan.  They will be our thanks for sending you to help us.
There is elven lich, named M'darfein, southeast of here.  He has been attacking Kratuuk's camp for ages, but now we can barely hold him off.
He wants ancient battlefield all to himself.  He has much magic power.  He said he feels we are needless distraction.  You must kill him before he kills Kratuuk!
Praise Saablic Tan!  Now go to northeast gate.  Here is key which opens secret door to battlefield.  Follow path to lich, kill him, then return. We will praise Saablic Tan together!
Speak!
They came with a puny cleric, saying something about *purifying the battlefield.*  The cleric escaped, but at least we have his companions.  Perhaps if you see him you'll kill him too, yes?
You're back.  Have you killed M'darfein?
What do you need to know?
Kratuuk barely remember...  But, Kratuuk do remember a great coldness just before opening Kratuuk's dead eyes and gazing upon the god, Saablic Tan.
Of course!  Kratuuk witnessed the miracle of Saablic Tan bringing Kratuuk's warriors back from dead, same way he brought Kratuuk back.  We praise him for making us better than living.
Yes.  We make sacrifices to Saablic Tan whenever we catch living.  It is tribute to show our devotion.
They are to be offered to the great god, Saablic Tan.  They will be our thanks for sending you to help us.
They came with a puny cleric, saying something about *purifying the battlefield.*  The cleric escaped, but at least we have his companions.  Perhaps if you see him you'll kill him too, yes?
There is elven lich, named M'darfein, southeast of here.  He has been attacking Kratuuk's camp for ages, but now we can barely hold him off.
He wants ancient battlefield all to himself.  He has much magic power.  He said he feels we are needless distraction.  You must kill him before he kills Kratuuk!
What do you need to know?
Kratuuk barely remember...  But, Kratuuk do remember a great coldness just before opening Kratuuk's dead eyes and gazing upon the god, Saablic Tan.
Of course!  Kratuuk witnessed the miracle of Saablic Tan bringing Kratuuk's warriors back from dead, same way he brought Kratuuk back.  We praise him for making us better than living.
Yes.  We make sacrifices to Saablic Tan whenever we catch living.  It is tribute to show our devotion.
There is elven lich, named M'darfein, southeast of here.  He has been attacking Kratuuk's camp for ages, but now we can barely hold him off.
He wants ancient battlefield all to himself.  He has much magic power.  He said he feels we are needless distraction.  You must kill him before he kills Kratuuk!
You have returned!  Good!  Tell me, did you kill M'darfein?
Praise Saablic Tan!  Oh, Saablic Tan did Kratuuk the honor, after you left, of appearing before Kratuuk.  He told Kratuuk something very interesting about you...
He said that you were here to destroy ancient battlefield and all who exist in it.  He said to kill you and to feast on your bones!
Your reward will be your broken bodies!  Saablic Tan graciously appeared before Kratuuk and told Kratuuk who you really are.  Warriors, kill them!
Hmm... Kratuuk sense deception... no, you not from Saablic Tan, you invaders!  Kratuuk kill!
Yes, Kratuuk not need rest, but will watch over you while rest.
Lich?  What lich?
May I ask you a few questions first?
May I ask you a few questions first?
Not before I rid the world of you!
Uh... yes... Saablic Tan sent us.  However, he was... vague in his directions.  What is it you need me to do?
Er, yes, Saablic Tan sent us - however, he, uh, wanted us to ask some questions first.
Uh... yes... Saablic Tan sent us.  However, he was... vague in his directions.  What is it you need me to do?
Er, yes, Saablic Tan sent us - however, he, uh, wanted us to ask some questions first.
No, I am here to destroy you!
How did you and your men become undead?
Why are those elves we passed imprisoned?
Tell me more about the lich.
I must attend to something first.  I'll be back.
On second thought, I'll just kill you.
Are you saying Saablic Tan made you like this?
I have other questions.
Let me reintroduce you to that coldness.
And now you worship him?
I have other questions.
Then allow me to return you to the dead!
Are the imprisoned elves we passed to be sacrificed?
I have other questions.
Enough!  Time to send you back to the dead!
What is it you need me to do?
Do you know why the elves came here in the first place?
Tell me more about the lich.
On second thought, I'll just kill you.
Why does he attack your camp?
May I ask you something else?
Then I will kill you and the lich!
I will do as you ask.
I must attend to something first.  I'll be back.
Oh, I will kill him, but not before I destroy you!
I need to ask you some questions.
Never mind.
Death wants you back, and I'm going to send you to him!
I'll see what I can do.  I have some more questions.
No, I'll just kill you and your horde.
Not yet. I need to ask you some questions.
Kratuuk, we need to recover our strength - would you watch over us while we rest?
Not yet, I'll do it now.
Not yet, I've decided to kill *you* first!
How did you get like this?
Why are those elves we passed earlier imprisoned?
Tell me again about the lich.
I must attend to something first.  I'll be back.
On second thought, I'll just kill you.
Are you saying Saablic Tan made you like this?
I have other questions.
Let me reintroduce you to that coldness.
And now you worship him?
I have other questions.
Then allow me to return you to the dead!
I have other questions.
That's all for now.
Enough!  Time to send you back to the dead!
Tell me again what it is you need me to do.
Do you know why the elves came here?
Tell me again about the lich.
On second thought, I'll just kill you.
I'll see what I can do.  I have some more questions.
No, I'll kill you and your horde instead.
Why does he attack your camp?
May I ask you something else?
Never mind.  Farewell.
Sounds to me like M'darfein has the right idea...
I have heard enough.  I will continue with my task.
I must attend to something first.  I'll be back.
Perhaps I will - after I attend to you.
How did you and your men become undead?
Tell me more about the lich.
I must attend to something first.  I'll be back.
On second thought, I'll just kill you.
Are you saying Saablic Tan made you like this?
I have other questions.
Let me reintroduce you to that coldness.
And now you worship him?
I have other questions.
Then allow me to return you to the dead!
I'm sure he appreciates that.  I have other questions.
Enough!  Time to send you back to the dead!
Why does he attack your camp?
Then I will kill you and the lich!
I will do as you ask.
I must attend to something first.  I'll be back.
I will kill the lich, but not before I kill you!
Yes, he will attack you no more.
Yes, I did.  Now where is my reward?
Yes, and now it's time to kill you!
Oh, and what was that?
He didn't say we were a band of troublesome mercenaries from the Ten-Towns, did he...?
I was wondering when you'd find out...  Prepare to become carrion once again!
We'll rest for eight hours, then.
We'll rest until healed.
